title: (10) of these Regulations except clause 6
clause_text: (10) of these Regulations except clause 6.11, , 6.16 & 6.18 shall apply. The payment of premium at the rate of 25% of normal premium or at the rate of 6.25% of the land rates as per ASR (for FSI 1), whichever is more shall apply.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
